metadata.title: CVE-2022-21216 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient granularity of access control in out-of-band management insome Intel(R) Atom and Intel Xeon Scalable Processors may allow aprivileged user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via adjacentnetwork access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
